segments.text: Do you think maybe it would be better to just talk to Vince ? Explain the situation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way . I want the satisfaction of squishing this bug myself . Plus , what if it's Vince ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think so . Your admirer seems kind of sweet . Aren't you even a little curious about him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's just a distraction , like a mosquito buzzing in my ear . I want no distractions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little distraction might do you some good , Zina .
segments.speaker: S1
